title: My champion idea
body:
this is my first champion concept so please go easy on me if you have questions just ask


Name: Altharn (i know its not the best but it'll do pig it'll do)

Title: knight of all trades


hp: 490+90 per lvl  =2110 max   hp re-gen 6.3 per 5 + .3 per lvl 11.7 per 5 max
resource: (adaption) 30+15 per 2 lvls decays after 10 seconds stopping at 15
AD: 48+4 per lvl 120 max
AP: 0+0 per lvl 0 max
movement speed: 345
AR: 25+3.7 per lvl 81.6 max
MR: 45+0 per lvl 45 max


passive : whenever an ability is activated you gain 5 points of adaption capping at the maximum when you get hit you consume 15 stacks and take does 15% less damage getting hit my nothing but true damage does not proc the passive as true damage cannot be stopped 
cool-downs never change not altered by cool-down reduction

q way of the sword : while active you gain 10/15/20/25/30 AD when activated the next the next attack will dash to the enemy (650 distance) and do a cone of damage 40/80/120/160/200+0.5 AD ratio  (5 second cool-down)

w way of the shield : when active you gain 10/20/30/40/50 AR and MR and a 5% chance to block attacks when activated the next attack will do 20/40/60/80/100+0.5 AR +0.7 AP ratio (5 second cool-down)

e way of the wind : while active you gain 6/7/8/9/10% movement speed and 5/10/15/20/25% attack speed when activated all enemy within a radius of 300 lose a single random buff enemy can only be affected every 2 minutes  

r final fight : passive: when the game starts you get a focus point and that goes into the ability you start with you gain a focus point every time you rank your ult 
   when activated you activate all focused ability you have put focus points into all activate at once at 200%/300% power for 15 seconds you can only focus the ult after lvl 6 (30 second cool-down after the ult has finished)

lore/story: throughout his many years of training Altharn has learnt many ways of fighting however doe to extensive knowledge and skill he finds it difficult to find a anyone who can challenge his skill in an attempt to find someone who can fight on his level he seeks out the institute of war to fight as a champion on the fields of justice.
